data.id: COVID19 Response Efforts (not brigade specific)/World Central Kitchen Coronavirus Food Relief

links.self: /organizations/COVID19 Response Efforts (not brigade specific)/projects/World Central Kitchen Coronavirus Food Relief.json

attributes.description: World Central Kitchen and Mapbox are working together to provide information on the availability of free or reduced-priced meals to families around the country. WCK and Mapbox want to display that information on a national map so that we can quickly identify areas that need support for these children and to ensure parents know where to find this information.
attributes.name: World Central Kitchen Coronavirus Food Relief
